title: World Template Manifest
description: The manifest.json file for a Minecraft Bedrock Edition world template. World templates package a complete world that players can use as a starting point for new worlds. They can include custom terrain, structures, and associated resource/behavior packs.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this manifest file. Use 2 for modern templates.

fields.title: Header
fields.description: The header section containing the template's identity: name, description, unique UUID, version, and base_game_version.

fields.title: Modules
fields.description: Declares modules within the template. For world templates, use type 'world_template'.

fields.title: Dependencies
fields.description: Optional list of behavior and resource packs this template depends on.

fields.title: Metadata
fields.description: Optional metadata about the template including author names and license.
